title: Hello, I know the bypass over at the corner of Market, Gorden, and Military Cutoff is going to be a huge project.  When do they expect to have the job complete?
text:
A construction let date has been set for October 2017, when the NCDOT will begin accepting bids from contractors, said Patrick Riddle with the N.C. Department of Transportation. 



Because the project is in development, he didn't have a completion date.



Here's link to a story with more:
